column5: I'm going up to the Sioux Lookout area in a few weeks. I've purchased leeches in Ft. Francis, Dryden before. Anyone have any recent experience purchasing this year and what's the quantity/LB cost currently? Any recommendations on Bait Shops would be greatly appreciated since I haven't been up there in 4 years or so. Thanks!
Rainy Lake Sports in Fort Frances, they always have good leeches and decent prices. $39+ tax for 1#.

i just returned from sioux lookout. the current price is 35 in nw ontario. i just purchased a lb in the sioux because i ran out and had no choice. i was charged 45 and they are the smallest that i have ever seen. i wiill try to return them next week when i return. i didnt look at them as they were in a bag and was shocked when i got home. they were the only people that sold them by the pound and i would strongly recommend you buy them before getting to the sioux. i dont want to knock the seller, maybe it was just a bad batch, but i am being honest with you.
$35 is a real good price, where did you find those at?
anywhere in the thunder bay area as well as verns in ignace.
Don't bother with Verns unless you want to pay $50.00
in kakabeka falls, larrys old shop is 36, larrys is 38 and down the road(i dont know the name) is 35.
I have fished LS in the sioux lookout area for a number of years and we never buy leeches because they have always looked pathetic there. I would pick up prior to SL to be safe.
